title: Ep 519 | Phil Delivers the Most Unusual Sermon & Jase Requests a Laughable Confession
description:
Al gets a text about something unexpected in Phil's recent sermon, and he decides to ask Phil about it in the studio. Phil's buddy refuses to give Phil his Italian meatball recipe, and Jase has a hilarious request of all good cooks! Phil recaps his recent self-inflicted injury, and Al introduces the first "Unashamed" contributor!

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://PrepareWithPhil.com and save $150 on your 3 month emergency food kit

Text UNASHAMED to 231-231 for a Complementary bottle of Nugenix Total T, plus a bottle of Nugenix Thermo free

Go to https://UnashamedMerch.com and use Code: Unashamed10 for 10% off and BlazeTV Subscribers get 20% off with the Code: BlazeSub
-
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
